question: On Sunday, Amanda wants to exercise for twice the amount of time he did on Saturday and Friday combined. On Friday he exercised for 39 minutes. On Saturday he exercised for 25 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Sunday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Friday and Saturday he exercised a total of 64 minutes because 39 + 25 = <<39+25=64>>64
On Sunday he has to exercise for 128 minutes because 64*2 = <<64*2=128>>128
#### 128
